TopicTitle: Behold the tri-pod! Absurd constructions of necessity?

Articles.Content:
So far the early career in 1.0.1/2 feels a good deal harder than in Beta and earlier, and I'm really digging the odd solutions it keeps making me come up with.

So here's something it would never have occurred to me to build earlier. But with the mk1-2 capsule midway down the tech tree, it's the only way to get 3 seats to orbit, and thus lets me double/triple stack contracts -- rescue a kerbonaut, carry an orbital tourist, and maybe also grab some science or test a part.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/K4KiU)

What improbable structures are you building out of necessity in the latest releases?

How did you handle the ascent? I ran into a whole of drag and resistance when attempting the same setup. My rocket almost completely tumbled over, I was able to keep it from crashing into the ground, but I wasted a lot of fuel trying to get into the upper atmosphere.

Thats just three pods... I think Ive done that like... fifty bagillion times

- - - Updated - - -

Still cool tho

Tripod......ok i get why you called it that.

That said, if you want a REAL tripod, add 3 legs and some ray guns ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yup, been doin' a lot of that m'self. Nutin' wrong with that mate!

Rune. It is not even that wrong by real world metrics.

I was not expecting this.

I was expecting a War of the Worlds kinda thing
